sentences.sContent: You never tell me what you're thinking. Am I supposed to use telepathy?
sentences.sCn: 你从来不告诉我你在想什么。我是不是该用心灵感应术呢？

remMethod.val: tele (远) + pathy (感应) → 心灵感应， 感应

words.tran: 传心术者；研究心灵感应术者
（心灵学用语）心灵感应；通灵；传心
（心灵学用语）心灵运输（物体、人）
使传心；使通灵；使心灵感应

trans.tranOther: a way of communicating in which thoughts are sent from one person’s mind to another person’s mind
